alert.note: Alert for Madison; Washington (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 16 at 1:33AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Madison and east central Washington Counties through 200 AM CDT... At 132 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm near West Fork, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea to penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations in or near the path include... Fayetteville... Elkins... West Fork... Greenland... Drake Field Airport... Woolsey... Sulphur City... Durham... Arnett... Hicks... Tuttle... This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 53 and 57. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
